heading: HB05586
0: AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE PHILIPPINE QUALIFICATIONS FRAMEWORK (PQF) AND ESTABLISHING THE PQF-NATIONAL COORDINATING COUNCIL
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA10968 enacted on 2018-01-16 Substituted by HB06572
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05586
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE PHILIPPINE QUALIFICATIONS FRAMEWORK (PQF) AND ESTABLISHING THE PQF-NATIONAL COORDINATING COUNCIL
ABSTRACT : PQF is a national policy which describes the levels of educational qualifications and set the standards for qualification outcomes; It is a quality assured national system for the development, recognition and award of qualifications based on standards of knowledge, skills and values acquired in different ways and methods by learners and workers of a certain country.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESCUDERO, EVELINA G.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-08
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Belaro (095 2017-05-29)2. Cortuna (002 2017-07-25)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:

      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-10-03
      3. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-10-03
          -Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 5366, 5586, 5600 and 6288 was approved without amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB06572
